mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.phone_num AS "phoneNum", a.code AS "code", a.send_time AS "sendTime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.code_type AS "codeType", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO verify_code_record( id, phone_num, code, send_time, create_by, code_type, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{phoneNum}, #{code}, #{sendTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{codeType}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE verify_code_record SET phone_num = #{phoneNum}, code = #{code}, send_time = #{sendTime}, code_type = #{codeType}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM verify_code_record a WHERE a.del_flag=0 AND a.phone_num=#{phoneNum} AND a.code_type=#{codeType} AND a.code=#{code} ORDER BY a.send_time DESC LIMIT 1
